dcterms:creator: Fritz Günther
Marco Marelli
Marco Alessandro Petilli
dcterms:description: A dataset containing ratings of image similarity for 3,000 pairs of naturalistic ImageNet images, collected from 480 participants with 30 observations per image pair.
dcterms:title: Image Similarity Dataset

dcterms:creator: Fritz Günther
Marco Marelli
Marco Alessandro Petilli
dcterms:description: A dataset containing ratings of visual word similarity for 3,000 word pairs, where participants judged how similar the objects denoted by the words look like.
dcterms:title: Visual Word Similarity Dataset

dcterms:creator: Fritz Günther
Marco Marelli
Marco Alessandro Petilli
dcterms:description: A dataset containing typicality ratings for 7,500 word-image pairs, where participants indicated the most and least typical image for each category denoted by the presented label.
dcterms:title: Typicality Ratings Dataset

dcterms:creator: Fritz Günther
Marco Marelli
Marco Alessandro Petilli
dcterms:description: A dataset for a discrimination task involving the same 3,000 image pairs from the IMG dataset, where participants indicated whether two presented images were identical or different.
dcterms:title: Discrimination Task Dataset

dcterms:creator: Fritz Günther
Marco Marelli
Marco Alessandro Petilli
dcterms:description: A dataset for a priming task involving the same 3,000 image pairs from the IMG and DIS datasets, where participants judged whether a real or scrambled image was presented.
dcterms:title: Priming Task Dataset
